name: Adventure Medical Kits Oral Rehydration Salts (3 Pack)
description: The original oral rehydration mix of the World Health Organization. Contains glucose, sodium and potassium. Dissolve one packet in one liter of water and sip your way back to health. Use for severe dehydration due to diarrhea, vomiting, and or sweat loss.Three packets, each for 1L of water.
